data.comment: The match is underway. Alkmaar have kicked-off.
Jesper Karlsson scores to make it 1-0 at AFAS Stadion.
In the minute 2, Dani De Wit with an assist there.
Zinedine Machach for Venlo has been booked by Christaan Bax and receives a first yellow card.
Great finish from Calvin Stengs to give Alkmaar a 2-0 lead.
In the minute 24, Great play from Jonas Svensson to set up the goal.
Roy Gelmi (Venlo) has received a yellow card from Christaan Bax.
Jonas Svensson (Alkmaar) sees red and is sent off in Alkmaar!
The first-half is over at AFAS Stadion.
In the minute 45, Torino Hunte is replacing Roy Gelmi for the away team.
The second-half has commenced. Venlo with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, At AFAS Stadion, Torino Hunte has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The away team replace Zinedine Machach with Ante Coric.
The home team have replaced Jesper Karlsson with Pantelis Chatzidiakos. This is the first substitution made today by Arne Slot.
In the minute 74, Jafar Arias is replacing Joshua John for Venlo at AFAS Stadion.
Alkmaar's Dani De Wit has been booked in Alkmaar.
Hans De Koning is making the team's fourth substitution at AFAS Stadion with Stan Van Dijck replacing Lukas Schmitz.
In the minute 86, Evert Linthorst (Venlo) heads in to reduce the deficit to 2-1.
Vito Van Crooij instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 88, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Venlo.
Giorgos Giakoumakis equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-2.
